srsdigital.page_title: SRS Digital - Smart Digital Solutions for Indonesian Solopreneurs
srsdigital.hero_title: Smart Digital Solutions for Indonesian Solopreneurs
srsdigital.hero_subtitle: Empowering your preloved & live-selling business with intelligent tools.
srsdigital.about_p1: At SRS Digital, we are driven by the immense potential of Indonesian solopreneurs. We understand that you're not just building a business; you're fostering community and contributing to a more sustainable future by giving preloved items a second life.
srsdigital.about_p2: Our mission is to provide intelligent digital tools that simplify your operations, save you valuable time, and equip you with the insights needed to grow. We focus on transforming administrative burdens into strategic advantages, allowing you to focus on what you do best: selling and engaging with your audience.
srsdigital.why_item1_p: Solutions built specifically to meet the unique needs of individual entrepreneurs and micro-businesses in Indonesia.
srsdigital.why_item2_p: Powerful tools designed for maximum ease of use, ensuring a smooth experience even for those less tech-savvy.
srsdigital.why_item3_p: Automate tedious administrative tasks, freeing you to focus on selling and engaging with your community.
srsdigital.why_item4_p: Gain valuable insights from your sales data to make informed decisions and effectively scale your business.
srsdigital.why_item5_p: Supporting businesses that contribute to a circular economy by extending the life of preloved goods.
srsdigital.why_item6_p: We're dedicated to helping you achieve greater efficiency and unlock new growth opportunities.
srsdigital.product1_p: The complete end-to-end toolchest for preloved resellers. Manage inventory, streamline payments, auto-reimburse consignors, and get insightful analytics to grow your business.
srsdigital.product2_p: Automate claim identification and build waitlists during your TikTok Live sessions. Klaimr organizes data in real-time for easy tracking and post-live recaps saving you precious time.
srsdigital.testimonial1_quote: "I used to spend over an hour on recaps after every live session, manually tracking everything in my phone notes. It was exhausting."
srsdigital.testimonial2_quote: "As a seller, you want to use tools that make things easier, especially for managing recaps and shipping."
srsdigital.contact_title: Ready to Transform Your Resale Business?
srsdigital.contact_p: Join Indonesian solopreneurs who are simplifying their operations and accelerating their growth with SRS Digital.
srsdigital.footer_copyright: © 2025 PT SRS Solusi Digital. All rights reserved.

klaimr.page_title: Klaimr - Automatically Track Your TikTok Live Winners
klaimr.hero_p: You sell it live, Klaimr keeps it neat. Claims, recapsâ€”handled.
klaimr.problem_h2: Selling Live on TikTok is Hard.
klaimr.carousel1_p: A flood of comments, manual notes are a headache
klaimr.carousel2_p: Klaimr automatically logs claims from comments during your Live
klaimr.carousel3_p: The session recap is instantly ready - just copy to WhatsApp or export to a spreadsheet
klaimr.tab1_p: Create a product list with unique codes (e.g., kaoscoklat10) so Klaimr can automatically detect claim comments
klaimr.tab2_p: Klaimr starts monitoring your TikTok Live and tracks claim comments from buyers in real-time. You just focus on selling!
klaimr.tab3_p: Once your Live ends, Klaimr instantly shows a full recap: who claimed what, whoâ€™s on the waitlist. You can copy it to WhatsApp or export it to a spreadsheet.
klaimr.testimonial1_p: "I never miss a claim anymore. Klaimr saves me hours of time."
klaimr.testimonial2_p: "This is what I needed! It's so easy to use."
